    groups: [ wheel ]

    shell: /bin/bash
    ssh-authorized-keys: 
    - ssh-rsa  bl_calm

attrs.script:
#!/bin/bash -xe

# Define variables
GO_VERSION=1.10.7
HL_ROOT=$HOME/go/src/github.com/hyperledger
USER=centos

# Install dependencies
sudo yum -y install bzip2 \
yum-utils \
device-mapper-persistent-data \
lvm2 \
git \
gcc \
gcc-c++ \
wget \
make

# Add docker-ce repo, install and enable docker service on startup
sudo yum-config-manager --add-repo https://download.docker.com/linux/centos/docker-ce.repo
sudo yum -y install docker-ce
sudo systemctl enable docker
sudo systemctl start docker

# Add privileges to run docker for $USER
sudo usermod -aG docker $USER
echo '{
    "live-restore": true,
    "group": "docker"
}' | sudo tee /etc/docker/daemon.json
sudo systemctl restart docker

# Install Fabric dependencies
## Go
wget https://dl.google.com/go/go${GO_VERSION}.linux-amd64.tar.gz && \
sudo tar -C /usr/local -xzf go${GO_VERSION}.linux-amd64.tar.gz
mkdir -p $HL_ROOT
echo -e 'export GOROOT=/usr/local/go \n
export GOPATH=$HOME/go \n
export PATH=$PATH:$GOROOT/bin'>>$HOME/.bash_profile
# sudo ln -s /usr/local/go/bin/go /usr/bin/go
source $HOME/.bash_profile
## Docker compose
curl -s --show-error --retry 5 https://bootstrap.pypa.io/get-pip.py | sudo python
sudo -H pip install requests --ignore-installed
sudo -H pip install docker-compose

#!/bin/bash -x

# Define variables
HL_ROOT=$HOME/go/src/github.com/hyperledger
DELAY=0

# Setup Hyperledger Fabric
source $HOME/.bash_profile && \
cd ${HL_ROOT} && \
git clone https://github.com/hyperledger/fabric.git && \
cd fabric && \
git checkout release-1.3 && \
make release && \
cd examples/e2e_cli && \
bash ./generateArtifacts.sh && \
cd $HL_ROOT/fabric && \
sudo setenforce 0 && \
make docker && \
cd examples/e2e_cli && \
sed -i '/docker logs -f cli/d' ./network_setup.sh && \
bash ./network_setup.sh up

# Fn: wait for 5 minutes or until success/failure of execution
ck_out() {
if [ ${DELAY} -ge 300 ]; then
echo "Network configuration failed to complete after 5 minutes, exiting"
exit 1
fi
echo -e "Waiting 30 seconds to complete execution"
sleep 30
OUT=`docker logs --tail 50 cli`
grep -q 'All GOOD, End-2-End execution completed' <<< "${OUT}"
if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
	echo "Network configuration was successful, exiting"
	exit 0
else
	grep -q 'FAILED to execute End-2-End Scenario' <<< "${OUT}"
	if [ $? -eq 0 ]; then
		echo "Network configuration FAILED"
		exit 1
	else
		echo "Total time of execution is $(($DELAY+30)) seconds, waiting for 30 seconds for process completion"
		ck_out
	fi
fi
}
# Fn call
ck_out

action_list.description: System action for creating an application
action_list.name: action_create

action_list.description: System action for uninstalling an application
action_list.name: action_uninstall
